title: What do you hate and love about League of Legends?
body: Hi, guys I wanted to ask a question, What do you hate and love about League of Legends? I wanted to make a video for a project that I am doing if anyone is willing to answer this question for me. Thank you so much is anyone does answer. Also, have an awesome day.

replies.body: I hate everything about it anymore. I used to love how every match was different, because you never knew what builds or compositions you'd be up against. These days, that sense of experimentation and surprise is largely gone. Everything else about the game is _really_ quite bad... I wish I could be of more help, but this is my honest opinion. m(._.)m

thanks for the honest opinion duded

I adore the artistic style of the game, champion and lore wise as well some the champions in game. There are other little things I like like champion voice lines, in my case It's for Jhin and Swain, I just love listening to their voice, the voice actors did an amazing job portraying both characters.
As the things I hate are I guess the mobility in game? It's sucks trying to catch or run away from someone like Akali or Zed If you are playing immobile champion. Or playing ADC in general (unless it's Jhin, but he is the only exception).

I hate high damage and 1 shots, I LOVE team fights they are the only reason I play league they are actually what got me into it in the first place.

I also love the strategy in the game with the enemy team like choosing to give up turrets or Dragons for another objective or stopping split pushers of fighting for vision, I also love the small skirmishes.

What about you?
I hate Riot's bias and skin based balancing.

Love the universe.

Hate Mecha Rengar.

I love the satisfaction of outplaying someone for the kill. I hate times where I die and **truly** feel like I could have done nothing. Not this "ree I got hit by a lux root and now I'm dead" crap but like getting hit by a veigar ulti at full health and dying
